troubleshooting.title: Unable to retrieve image data
troubleshooting.checkApi: Please confirm that you can access the Eagle API
troubleshooting.urlDifferent: If the Eagle API URL is different, please specify the URL with the server startup option.
troubleshooting.sameMachine: Please run the Eagle WebUI server on the same machine as Eagle
troubleshooting.accessRequirement: At least the server must be able to access the Eagle API and reference images via the paths returned by the API.
